original: 行至金城以西，遇雪，夜宿渡口。約子丑之交，驚聞虎嘯如雷，遠眺林中月下，見白虎與惡蛟相鬥，虎勝後銜屍而去，不知所蹤。
text: Travel to the west of Jincheng, meet snow, stay overnight at the ferry. In the acquaintance of Yue Zi Chou, he was shocked to hear the tiger roaring like thunder. Looking at the moon in the forest, he saw the white tiger fighting against the evil scorpion.
